tp.model

Class CityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.model.CityManager

  • public class CityManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a city manager, it can
    • add a city
    • remove a city
    • return the list of cities
    • search a city with a given name
    • search a city at a position
    • return the list of cities near 10km of the given position

    • Constructor Summary

      CityManager()
      Create a new CityManager with no arguments.

      • addCity

        public boolean addCity(City city)
        Appends a new city at the end of the list
        Parameters:
        city - city to be appended to this list
        Returns:
        true

      • removeCity

        public boolean removeCity(City city)
                   throws CityNotFound
        Remove the first occurence of the city. If the list does not contain the city the list stay unchanged
        Parameters:
        city - City to be removed from the list
        Returns:
        true if the list contain the city
        Throws:
        CityNotFound

      • searchFor

        public java.util.List<City> searchFor(java.lang.String cityName)
        Return a List of City with the name in parameter of the city. (As we know, a cityName can be use in many countries). Ex : Paris (in France) and Paris(in USA)
        Parameters:
        cityName - The name of the city
        Returns:
        tmp A list of cities.

      • searchExactPosition

        public City searchExactPosition(Position position)
                         throws CityNotFound
        Return the city at the exact position if it exist
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the city
        Returns:
        city The city if it exist
        Throws:
        CityNotFound - If the city don't exist we throw an exception

      • searchNear

        public java.util.List<City> searchNear(Position p)
        With the function searcNear you can have a list of cities around a position
        Parameters:
        p - the parameter is the position
        Returns:
        tmp The return value is the list of cities around the parameter p.
